name: Bouncy Bob
description: One button local multiplayer game + single mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9800GT or better w /512MB VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible Additional Notes: Only one button is needed to control your character. Standard PC keyboard allows max 4 players to enjoy the game simultaneously. Controller is also supported in game, mind that you need mouse for menu navigation.
